text: Some grim comic relief was provided by an elderly farm labourer out for a shoot who hid himself in a bush and imitated a blackbird. Unfortunately a sporting taxi-driver was after this very bird and shot the farm-labourer in the face. All, however, ended well, reported the paper, since the pellets were easily removed and the labourer was able to return to work the same afternoon.

All, however, ended well, reported the paper, since the pellets were easily removed and the labourer was able to return to work the same afternoon.
